attributes.action: Bring Back Death Sentance for Crimes such as Baby P
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, who sign this petition demand that we reinstate in death penalty in such cases as the "baby P" case.  We do not want any tax payers money to go to keeping these people in prison or giving them new identity's in the future.  It has been claimed by many MP's before that they know if the public had there way, it would still be used, so we demand it be at least subject to a referendum.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
